thread.title: FG extends tenure of 2016 budget capital elements
thread.title_full: FG extends tenure of 2016 budget capital elements

author: Nduka Chiejina
title: FG extends tenure of 2016 budget capital elements
text: Home News Update FG extends tenure of 2016 budget capital elements FG extends tenure of 2016 budget capital elements Posted By: Nduka Chiejina on: March 30, 2017 Tweet 0 Adeosun The Accountant-General of the Federation, Alhaji Idris Ahmed has issued a Circular extending the tenure of the Capital elements of the 2016 Budget until May 5, 2017 or the passage of the 2017 Budget, whichever is the earliest, Minister of Finance, Mrs. Kemi Adeosun has announced. Federal Ministries, Departments and Agencies have been urged to take note of the content of the Circular.
